author: Stereogum
title: Watch A Teaser For Roger Waters’ New Album Is This The Life We Really Want?
text: Former Pink Floyd frontman Roger Waters is returning in May with Is This The Life We Really Want?, his first solo album in nearly 25 years. We already knew that Radiohead collaborator Nigel Godrich produced it , and now Waters has shared a little teaser video featuring some studio footage and some music from the … More »
